About Us:

"Hello! My name is Ethan Wuerslin, and I am a sophomore in the AI track of the IT pathway at Innovation Academy. I think AI will be a large part of our generation's future and want to figure out how to use it. Thank you for reading our page!"


"Hello, my name is Viswa Venkatachalam, and I am a student at Innovation Academy. I was a co-author of the page you see here, along with the landing and information pages of AI Security & Surveillance. Our understanding of HTML when we first began this project was rudimentary at best, but with the help of Copilot, we were able to fill the gaps in our knowledge and share with you the information we believe everyone should know. It really is quite fitting that students of Innovation Academy's AI pathway prevailed with the use of AI."
